name: Michele Blood
what_you_do: Creates affirmation-based personal development products, seminars, books, audio programs, and apps combining affirmations with music (MusiVation™) to help people achieve success and enlightenment.
who_you_serve: People seeking personal transformation, spiritual enlightenment, and success through positive thought and affirmation practices.
social_proof: Events held in over 26 countries, largest audience of 50,000 in Kuala Lumpur, co-written and created over 80 books and audio programs, appeared in hundreds of podcasts and radio shows, endorsed by Bob Proctor and Brian Tracy, co-author with Bob Proctor.
signature_programs: Magnet To Success™ products, MusiVation™, Magnet To Money Affirmation App, The Magic of Affirmation Power (book), Become a Magnet to Money Through the Sea of Unlimited Consciousness (book with Bob Proctor), Mystical Success Events, The Mystical Experience
business_focus: Teaching personal transformation and enlightenment through affirmation-based products, music, books, apps, and live events worldwide.
service_provided: Seminars, live events, books, audio programs, mobile apps, TV shows, videos, podcasts, meditation teachings, online programs
